verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In Monday 's installment on Twitter] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: combined] [ARG1: renewed attacks on the media] [ARG2: with criticism of predecessor Barack Obama] . But skeptics continue to cite the lack of specifics in the agreement signed by Trump and Kim Jong Un .
